title: New Site Updates
content:
Got the Typophile crew together today and made a few quick updates:

1. Browse recent users via [http://typophile.com/avatars](http://web.archive.org/web/20111107074757/http:/typophile.com/avatars "http://typophile.com/avatars")  
2. Dig into content via [http://typophile.com/tags](http://web.archive.org/web/20111107074757/http:/typophile.com/tags "http://typophile.com/tags")  
3. Fixed a bug keeping [http://typophile.com/news](http://web.archive.org/web/20111107074757/http:/typophile.com/news "http://typophile.com/news") or [http://typophile.com/aggregator](http://web.archive.org/web/20111107074757/http:/typophile.com/aggregator "http://typophile.com/aggregator") from running properly. (Let us know what type blogs you'd like to see in this space!)  
4. Other behind-the-scenes fixes.

Watch this space for more updates as they unfold. And keep tagging those posts!

//jared
author: Jared Benson
